text: Sixth ’ s time ’ s the charm for Laura Dern : The actress took home her first Primetime Emmy Award for her supporting role in the HBO miniseries Big Little Lies at the 69th annual ceremony Sunday night in Los Angeles. “ I share this with my tribe of four ladies, ” said Dern, referring to costars Nicole Kidman, Reese Witherspoon, Shailene Woodley, and Zoe Kravitz. “ I feel very proud to be reflecting fierce women and mothers finding their voice. “ I ’ m just incredibly blessed and I feel so stoked to be here with you. ” Dern won for her portrayal of Renata Klein, a bigwig working mother who finds herself locked in battle with the other mom of Monterey when her daughter is the victim of bullying.
